outputs.output_descr: The Technical Secretariat (TS) supports the Steering Committee (SC) and provides quality assurance and compliance throughout the programme/project approval process and facilitates the preparation and decision-making of proposals submitted. It also oversees the monitoring and evaluation activities of the Participating UN Organizations.
